title: Chicken and Butter Bean Bake
ingredients: ['450g dried butter beans', '4 tablespoons milk', 'salt to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '450g chicken, blitzed in a food processor until minced', '1 courgette, chopped', '1 large tomato, chopped', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '115g Mozzarella cheese, grated', '4 tablespoons grated Parmigiano Reggiano (Parmesan) cheese']
